modes.name: Extreme – ~32–38 Processes (Local Account Recommended)
modes.description: Intended ONLY for a dedicated local lab account. Strips non-critical Windows features very aggressively to push process count into the low-30s for FPS and latency.  Intended ONLY for a dedicated local lab account. Strips non-critical Windows features very aggressively to push background processes into the low-30s for FPS and latency.
